sentence.Network_en: She didn't seem at all impressed by his deductive powers.
sentence.Network_cn: 她似乎根本不为他的推论能力所动。

sentence.Network_en: At one point in the Metaphysics, Aristotle seems to distinguish between empirical studies and deductive logic.
sentence.Network_cn: 在《形而上学》一书中, 亚里士多德似乎已谈到了经验研究和推理逻辑的区别.

sentence.Network_en: Deductive inference and non - deductive inference are often used in mathematical proof.
sentence.Network_cn: 演绎推理和 非 演绎推理经常被运用到数学证明中.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... deduction test 演绎测验 deductive 演绎的 deductive argumentation 演绎论证.
SAT官方发布高频词汇汇总_百度文库 ... logic： 逻辑的 deductive： 推论的 automatically： 无意识的天道留学.
GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... deduct 减去，扣除；演绎 deductive 推理的，演绎的 deface 损坏.

list.abs: 扣字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 扣杀〖 smash(theball)〗 扣除〖 deduct〗 扣发〖 deprive〗.
BEC中级、高级考试词汇超值下载篇-BEC商务英语 ... decrease v. 减少 deduct v. 扣除，减去 default n. 违约，未履行.
如同演绎（deduction）一样，归纳（ induction，正是学习器所做的） 起到知识杠杆的作用 —— 它将少量的输入知识转化成为大量的 …
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... deduce v 推论，演绎 deduction n 推论；减法 induce v 劝诱，诱导.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from medieval Latin deductivus, from deduct- 'deduced', from the verb deducere (see deduce)

entry.def: Deductive reasoning involves drawing conclusions logically from other things that are already known.

example.ex: She didn't seem at all impressed by his deductive powers.
example.tran: 她似乎根本不为他的推论能力所动。

auth_sentence.content: It's inductive logic that's needed, not deductive.

auth_sentence.content: It is not just in teir deductive processes that this difference manifests.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is not just in teir deductive processes that this difference manifests.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is not just in teir deductive processes that this difference manifests.
